attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petitioned the Prime Minister to present to Parliament legislation that would allow local governments to apply to the appropriate Secretary of State for powers rentcap commercial premises.  These powers could only be granted given specific conditions
 1) the premises must be on or around a towns high Street 
2) be part of an overall regeneration plan.

This legislation is needed to halt the decline in the viability of our town centres and to stop the homogenisation of our centres, it would allow small and medium-sized businesses to compete with international brands on a level playing field
